channel.title: Introduction on Verric's Blog

item.title: Kotlin in Action: Chapter 1
item.description: Chapter 1: Kotlin Basics Kotlin overview Created and currently maintained by JetBrains Designed to be a pragmatic, concise and safe language above all else Supports OOP and FP Statically Typed Can be compiled into JVM bytecode or JS bytecode (runs on JVM or in browsers) Currently targets Java 1.6 bytecode to be compatible with Android Interoperable with Java and most JVM languages (can use classes, methods etc from other languages) Has an absolute disdain for Null pointer Exceptions, most code that could throw an NPE will fail to compile Starting Kotlin - Basics Unavoidable HelloWorld.
